about_the_game:
Dikec Clicker is an addictive clicker game that tests your clicking speed and strategic skills. Dive into the colorful and fun world of the DIKEC meme with simple yet deep game mechanics. The goal of the game is to use your clicking and strategy skills to achieve the highest possible scores and break records. Focus on your goal and enjoy the clicking fun!

Key Features:

Addictive Gameplay: Starts with a simple left click, but the game experience deepens.
Colorful Graphics: Explore the humorous and entertaining world of the DIKEC meme.
Records and Leaderboards: Compete with friends and players from around the world.
Constant Updates: Keep your game experience fresh with new game elements, challenges, and features.

The goal of the game is to use your clicking and strategy skills to achieve the highest possible scores and break records. Focus on your goal and enjoy the clicking fun!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

name: Dikec Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Not one of those scammy clickers. It's a legit old-school clicker, themed around one of the world's fastest-growing memes, DIKEC! Take a deep breath, lock-in, and get ready to smash some records!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Hindi
